data.description:
Deletes the character if already defeated.
Set the argument "minSpawns" to the number of times
the player should enter the field before the enemy shows up again.
data.name: Spawn Check

events.condition: not FieldManager.playerInput or not script:collidedWith('player') or {%deltaBattleTime} <= 60
events.name: jumpTo

data.description:
Walks towards a character, constantly,
while the player is free to move.
data.name: Follow Character

data.description:
Walk cycle for characters that follow another
character (by default, the player) around.
data.name: Random Walk

data.description: Tests scene execution on field enter.
